curam.util.client.domain.marshal

Class TextMarshal

  • java.lang.Object
    • curam.util.common.plugin.AbstractPlugIn
      • curam.util.common.domain.AbstractDomainPlugIn
        • curam.util.client.domain.marshal.AbstractDomainMarshal
          • curam.util.client.domain.marshal.TextMarshal
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    DomainMarshal, DomainPlugIn, PlugIn

    public class TextMarshal
extends AbstractDomainMarshal
    A simple marshal for domains with simple values. The resolver does not expect to assemble multiple values or resolve paths to values embedded in the data. This is the most common type of processing required and is suitable for domains using simple strings, numbers, dates, code-table codes, and any other simple values.

    • Method Detail

      • assemble

        public java.lang.String assemble(java.util.Map<Path,FormItem> data)
        Gets the first value in the value set of the map.
        Parameters:
        data - The map associating paths with form items.
        Returns:
        The assembled value that will be parsed and validated by the domain converter.

      • get

        public java.lang.String get(java.lang.Object data,
                            Path path)
        Gets the data unchanged and ignores the path. If overriding this class, the type of the value returned by the DomainMarshal.preResolve(String) method must be the same as the type expected by this method, i.e., a java.lang.String in this case.
        Parameters:
        data - The data to used when resolving the path.
        path - The path to be resolved. The root of the path is the data itself; it does not include the path steps that select the server interface property.
        Returns:
        The string representation of the value that was resolved.

      • getList

        public java.util.List<java.lang.String> getList(java.lang.Object data,
                                                Path path)
                                         throws MarshalException
        Resolves a path to a list of values embedded in a value of a complex type of domain.
        Specified by:
        getList in interface DomainMarshal
        Overrides:
        getList in class AbstractDomainMarshal
        Parameters:
        data - The data to used when resolving the path.
        path - The path to be resolved. Ignored in this case.
        Returns:
        A list of the formatted values embedded in the complex object specified by the path.
        Throws:
        MarshalException - If the path cannot be resolved.
